src:
Nova 5T najnovejša naprava s podpisom Huawei
Iščete napravo, ki ponuja največ za svojo ceno? Pametni telefon nova 5T, s štirimi zadnjimi kamerami, vrhunskimi zmogljivostmi, osupljivimi barvami in zaslonom, ki pokriva kar 83,4-odstotka sprednje površine je naprava, ki je gotovo v ožjem izboru. In cena?  369 evrov.
06 Nov 2019, 07:20 by P. I.



Huawei Nova 5T ima kar štiri kamere. FOTO: Huawei



FOTO: Huawei



FOTO: Huawei



FOTO: Huawei



FOTO: Huawei



FOTO: Huawei



FOTO: Huawei



FOTO: Huawei


4 zadaj in odlična ena spredaj.Ta pametni telefon ima na zadnji strani štiri kamere. Glavno s tipalom ločljivosti 48 milijonov slikovnih pik dopolnjujejo kamera z ločljivostjo 16 milijonov slikovnih pik in ultra širokokotnim objektivom ter še dve z ločljivostjo dveh milijonov slikovnih pik. Ena za podatke o globini posnetka in druga za bližinsko (makro) fotografijo. Huaweijevi pametni telefoni so sinonim vrhunske mobilne fotografije, opisan sistem zadnjih kamer pa obeta velik napredek tudi v kakovosti video posnetkov. Huawei je sicer prav tako eno izmed vodilnih podjetji, ko gre za mobilno fotografijo podprto z umetno inteligenco. Nova 5T glede tega ni izjema, saj ima med drugim napredni nočni način fotografiranja, ki občutno izboljša kakovost fotografij pri šibki svetlobi. Zaslon od roba do robaVelik 6,22-palčni (15,8 cm) zaslon tehnologije IPS se lahko pohvali z ločljivostjo 2440 x 1080 slikovnih pik, kar predstavlja visoko gostoto 412 pik na palec. Sega do robov naprave, sprednja kamera pa je pod preluknjanim delom, ki pa je na takem mestu, da uporabnika ne moti med uporabo telefona. Prednja kamera ima sicer tipalo ločljivosti 32 milijonov slikovnih pik, njeno delo pa je prav tako podprto z umetno inteligenco, zato se uporabniku ni treba ubadati z nastavitvami.


FOTO: Huawei

Ni ovir za igričarjeZmogljivo in predvsem gladko delovanje naprave zagotavlja procesor Kirin 980, ki med drugim vključuje tudi tehnologijo GPU Turbo za gladko poganjanje mobilnih iger. Uporabniku pa je na voljo kar 6 GB delovnega in 128 GB notranjega pomnilnika, zato je bojazen, da bi bilo tega premalo, odveč. Energije ne zmanjka, zapeljujejo barvePametni telefon Huawei nova 5T ima baterijo kapacitete 3750 mAh, ki podpira hitro polnjenje SuperCharge z močjo 22,5 W. To zagotavlja dovolj energije v vseh pogojih rabe. Potrebnih je namreč le 30 minut, da prazna baterija doseže 50-odstotno napolnjenost. Tipalo prstnega odtisa je na bočnem robu nove 5T, ki je na voljo v treh barvah: modri (Crush Blue), vijolični (Midsummer Purple) in črni. Priporočena maloprodajna cena telefona pa znaša 469 evrov.Sočasno z novo 5T je na slovenskem trgu na voljo tudi naslednja generacija pametnih ur, Huawei Watch GT 2 premera 46 mm. Vgrajen procesor Kirin A1 odlikujejo visoka energijska učinkovitost, vsebuje napredno enoto za obdelavo zvoka, aplikativni procesor, enoto za povezavo Bluetooth ter ločeno enoto za upravljanje porabe. Zaradi tega ura delujejo neprekinjeno do dva tedna z vključenim inteligentnim nadzorom srčnega utripa in funkcijo prikaza obvestil s pametnega telefona. Poleg tega lahko tedensko opravite do 30 minut telefonskih pogovorov prek povezave Bluetooth, do 30 minut poslušate glasbo, do 90 minut beležite športno dejavnost ali imate vključeno natančno beleženje kakovosti spanja.


FOTO: Huawei


Več o novi pametni uri in telefonu najdete na:



https://consumer.huawei.com/si/wearables/watch-gt2/ in


https://consumer.huawei.com/si/phones/nova-5t/.
text:
New 5T latest Huawei signature device
Looking for a device that offers the most value for money? The smartphone, the new 5T, with four rear cameras, superior performance, stunning colors and a screen that covers as much as 83.4 percent of the front, is a short-listed device. And the price? 369 euros.
06 Nov 2019, 07:20 by P.I.



The Huawei Nova 5T has as many as four cameras. PHOTO: Huawei



PHOTO: Huawei



PHOTO: Huawei



PHOTO: Huawei



PHOTO: Huawei



PHOTO: Huawei



PHOTO: Huawei



PHOTO: Huawei


4 in the back and a great one in the front. This smartphone has four cameras in the back. Mainly with a 48-megapixel sensor, it is complemented by a 16-megapixel camera with an ultra-wide-angle lens, and two more with a 2-megapixel resolution. One for depth of field data and the other for close (macro) photography. Huawei smartphones are synonymous with high-end mobile photography, and the described rear camera system also promises great advances in video quality. Huawei is also one of the leading companies in artificial intelligence-enabled mobile photography. The new 5T is no exception in that it has, among other things, an advanced night mode that significantly improves the quality of low-light photography. Edge-to-edge displayThe large 6.22-inch (15.8 cm) IPS display boasts a resolution of 2440 x 1080 pixels, representing a high density of 412 pixels per inch. It extends to the edges of the device, with the front camera underneath the punctured part, but in a location that does not disturb the user while using the phone. Although the front camera has a 32-megapixel sensor, its work is also supported by artificial intelligence, so the user does not have to worry about settings.


PHOTO: Huawei

No obstacles for gamersThe Kirin 980 processor, which includes GPU Turbo technology for smooth running of mobile games, provides powerful and above all smooth operation of the device. However, the user has as much as 6 GB of working memory and 128 GB of internal memory, so the fear that this might be too little is unnecessary. Huawei's new 5T smartphone has a 3750 mAh battery that supports 22.5 W. SuperCharge fast charging, providing enough power in all conditions of use. It only takes 30 minutes for the empty battery to reach 50% charge. The fingerprint sensor is on the side of the new 5T, which comes in three colors: blue (Crush Blue), purple (Midsummer Purple) and black. The suggested retail price of the phone is € 469. Along with the new 5T, the next generation of smartwatches, the Huawei Watch GT 2, is 46 mm in diameter on the Slovenian market. The built-in Kirin A1 processor features high energy efficiency, features an advanced sound processing unit, application processor, Bluetooth connectivity unit and a separate power management unit. As a result, the clock works continuously for up to two weeks with intelligent heart rate monitoring and smartphone notification feature enabled. In addition, you can make up to 30 minutes of phone calls per week via Bluetooth, listen to music for up to 30 minutes, record sports activities for up to 90 minutes, or have accurate sleep quality recorded.


PHOTO: Huawei


Learn more about the new smartphone and watch at:



https://consumer.huawei.com/en/wearables/watch-gt2/ in


https://consumer.huawei.com/en/phones/nova-5t/.
